contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Ichinohe |JapaneseName= 一戸町 |settlement_type= Town |MapImage= Ichinohe in Iwate Prefecture.png |Region= [[Tōhoku region|Tōhoku]] |Prefecture= [[Iwate Prefecture|Iwate]] |District= [[Ninohe District, Iwate|Ninohe]] |Area_km2= 300.11 |PopDate= 2003 |Population= 16,028 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees= 40 |LatitudeMinutes= 12 |LatitudeSeconds= |LongtitudeDegrees= 141 |LongtitudeMinutes= 18 |LongtitudeSeconds= |Tree= |Flower= |Bird= |Fish= |SymbolImage= |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= |CityHallPostalCode= |CityHallAddress= |CityHallPhone= |CityHallLink= [http://www.town.ichinohe.iwate.jp/ Town of Ichinohe] }} {{nihongo|'''Ichinohe'''|一戸町|Ichinohe-machi}} is a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Ninohe District, Iwate]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the town has an estimated [[population]] of 16,028 and a [[population density]] of 53.41 persons per km². The total area is 300.11 km². ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} *[http://www.town.ichinohe.iwate.jp/ Ichinohe official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Towns in Iwate Prefecture]] {{Iwate-geo-stub}}
